definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)

sentences.english: Trembling as the wind blew, which told of his joy of reunion to me by the dense aroma of white lotus.
sentences.chinese: 風顫顫，用白荷釅釅的花香告訴我重逢的喜悅。

sentences.english: Trembling as the wind blew, which told of his joy of reunion to me by the dense aroma of white lotus.
sentences.chinese: 風顫顫，用白荷釅釅的花香告訴我重逢的喜悅。

sentences.english: Sweet like ambergris still strong white, taste like milk more clear all.
sentences.chinese: 香似龍涎仍釅白，味如牛乳更全清。

sentences.english: One can refresh oneself through drinking the delicious and strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 如此喝茶，香高味釅，提神解渴。

sentences.english: He is a man whom we should all learn from.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個除夜家皆釅進建的人。

definition: old name for Wenzhou City 溫州市|温州市[Wen1 zhou1 shi4] in Zhejiang 浙江[Zhe4 jiang1]
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
